input:
Question: What is the first step now to take in order to cook the dish? 
 Context: Ingredients: 1 spaghetti squash, halved lengthwise and seeded, 1 onion, chopped, 2 tablespoons minced garlic, 2 (14 ounce) cans stewed tomatoes, 1 tablespoon dried basil, 1 cube vegetable bouillon, black pepper to taste, 1 (15 ounce) can black olives, chopped, 1 cup shredded mozzarella cheese, 1 cup shredded Parmesan cheese, 
Directions: 0) Preheat oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C). 1) Spray a baking sheet with a thin layer of cooking spray. 2) Place squash halves cut side down on the baking sheet. 3) Bake squash 35 minutes in the preheated oven, or until a knife can be easily inserted. 4) Remove from oven, and cool. 5) Meanwhile, spray a non-stick saucepan with cooking spray. 6) Over medium heat, saute the onion and garlic until golden brown. 7) Stir in tomatoes, basil, bouillon cube, and black pepper. 8) Cook for about 15 minutes, or until you have a medium thick sauce. 9) Remove squash strands with a fork, reserving the shells. 10) Layer each half with a spoonful of the sauce, a layer of spaghetti squash strands, olives, and mozzarella cheese. 11) Repeat layers until shells are full, or until all of the ingredients are used. 12) Top with Parmesan cheese. 13) Bake for 20 minutes in the preheated oven, or until Parmesan cheese melts.
conv_answer: Now we preheat the oven to 325 degrees Fahrenheit.
target_answer: 0) Preheat oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C).

Directions: 0) Preheat oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C). 1) Spray a baking sheet with a thin layer of cooking spray. 2) Place squash halves cut side down on the baking sheet. 3) Bake squash 35 minutes in the preheated oven, or until a knife can be easily inserted. 4) Remove from oven, and cool. 5) Meanwhile, spray a non-stick saucepan with cooking spray. 6) Over medium heat, saute the onion and garlic until golden brown. 7) Stir in tomatoes, basil, bouillon cube, and black pepper. 8) Cook for about 15 minutes, or until you have a medium thick sauce. 9) Remove squash strands with a fork, reserving the shells. 10) Layer each half with a spoonful of the sauce, a layer of spaghetti squash strands, olives, and mozzarella cheese. 11) Repeat layers until shells are full, or until all of the ingredients are used. 12) Top with Parmesan cheese. 13) Bake for 20 minutes in the preheated oven, or until Parmesan cheese melts.
conv_answer: Top with Parmesan cheese.
target_answer: 12) Top with Parmesan cheese.

Question: How do I make the deep fried turkey? 
 Context: Ingredients: 3 gallons peanut oil for frying, or as needed, 1 (12 pound) whole turkey, neck and giblets removed, 1/4 cup Creole seasoning, 1 white onion, 
Directions: 0) In a large stockpot or turkey fryer, heat oil to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C). 1) Be sure to leave room for the turkey, or the oil will spill over. 2) Layer a large platter with food-safe paper bags. 3) Rinse turkey, and thoroughly pat dry with paper towels. 4) Rub Creole seasoning over turkey inside and out. 5) Make sure the hole at the neck is open at least 2 inches so the oil can flow freely through the bird. 6) Place the whole onion and turkey in drain basket. 7) The turkey should be placed in basket neck end first. 8) Slowly lower basket into hot oil to completely cover turkey. 9) Maintain the temperature of the oil at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C), and cook turkey for 3 1/2 minutes per pound, about 45 minutes. 10) Carefully remove basket from oil, and drain turkey. 11) Insert a meat thermometer into the thickest part of the thigh; the internal temperature must be 180 degrees F (80 degrees C). 12) Finish draining turkey on the prepared platter.
conv_answer: Do you have a large stockpot or turkey fryer?
target_answer: 0) In a large stockpot or turkey fryer, heat oil to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).

 Context: Ingredients: 3 gallons peanut oil for frying, or as needed, 1 (12 pound) whole turkey, neck and giblets removed, 1/4 cup Creole seasoning, 1 white onion, 
Directions: 0) In a large stockpot or turkey fryer, heat oil to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C). 1) Be sure to leave room for the turkey, or the oil will spill over. 2) Layer a large platter with food-safe paper bags. 3) Rinse turkey, and thoroughly pat dry with paper towels. 4) Rub Creole seasoning over turkey inside and out. 5) Make sure the hole at the neck is open at least 2 inches so the oil can flow freely through the bird. 6) Place the whole onion and turkey in drain basket. 7) The turkey should be placed in basket neck end first. 8) Slowly lower basket into hot oil to completely cover turkey. 9) Maintain the temperature of the oil at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C), and cook turkey for 3 1/2 minutes per pound, about 45 minutes. 10) Carefully remove basket from oil, and drain turkey. 11) Insert a meat thermometer into the thickest part of the thigh; the internal temperature must be 180 degrees F (80 degrees C). 12) Finish draining turkey on the prepared platter.
conv_answer: Now you can place the turkey and 1 white onion in the drain basket of the fryer.
target_answer: 6) Place the whole onion and turkey in drain basket.

predictions: 8) Slowly lower basket into hot oil to completely cover turkey.
labels: 7) The turkey should be placed in basket neck end first.

Question: Can we start with the recipe now? 
 Context: Ingredients: 1 pound ground pork, 4 cups shredded cabbage, 1 large carrot, shredded, 1/2 green bell pepper, cut into thin strips, 1 medium onion, chopped, 3 cloves garlic, minced, 3 teaspoons fresh ginger root, grated, 1 tablespoon cornstarch, 2 tablespoons soy sauce, 1 1/2 tablespoons molasses, 2 tablespoons vegetable oil, 1 quart oil for frying, 1 1/2 (14 ounce) packages egg roll wrappers, 1 1/2 cups sweet and sour sauce, 
Directions: 0) Cook pork in a large wok over medium-high heat. 1) Drain and set aside. 2) In a large bowl, mix the cabbage, carrot, green bell pepper, onion, garlic and ginger. 3) In a small bowl, mix the cornstarch, soy sauce, and molasses until smooth. 4) Heat 2 tablespoons oil in wok. 5) Stir in cabbage mixture in batches, cooking each batch 3 to 4 minutes, just until tender. 6) Return vegetables to bowl, and mix in pork. 7) Stir in the cornstarch mixture. 8) Heat 1 quart oil in a deep fryer to 365 degrees F (185 degrees C). 9) Place about 1 tablespoon filling on each egg roll wrapper. 10) Fold one corner of wrapper over filling. 11) Fold wrapper sides over filling. 12) Roll wrappers to form egg rolls. 13) Fry egg rolls in batches in the hot oil until golden brown. 14) Drain on paper towels and serve with sweet and sour sauce.
conv_answer: Yes let's start. First cook the pork in a large wok over medium-high heat.
target_answer: 0) Cook pork in a large wok over medium-high heat.

 Context: Ingredients: 1 pound ground pork, 4 cups shredded cabbage, 1 large carrot, shredded, 1/2 green bell pepper, cut into thin strips, 1 medium onion, chopped, 3 cloves garlic, minced, 3 teaspoons fresh ginger root, grated, 1 tablespoon cornstarch, 2 tablespoons soy sauce, 1 1/2 tablespoons molasses, 2 tablespoons vegetable oil, 1 quart oil for frying, 1 1/2 (14 ounce) packages egg roll wrappers, 1 1/2 cups sweet and sour sauce, 
Directions: 0) Cook pork in a large wok over medium-high heat. 1) Drain and set aside. 2) In a large bowl, mix the cabbage, carrot, green bell pepper, onion, garlic and ginger. 3) In a small bowl, mix the cornstarch, soy sauce, and molasses until smooth. 4) Heat 2 tablespoons oil in wok. 5) Stir in cabbage mixture in batches, cooking each batch 3 to 4 minutes, just until tender. 6) Return vegetables to bowl, and mix in pork. 7) Stir in the cornstarch mixture. 8) Heat 1 quart oil in a deep fryer to 365 degrees F (185 degrees C). 9) Place about 1 tablespoon filling on each egg roll wrapper. 10) Fold one corner of wrapper over filling. 11) Fold wrapper sides over filling. 12) Roll wrappers to form egg rolls. 13) Fry egg rolls in batches in the hot oil until golden brown. 14) Drain on paper towels and serve with sweet and sour sauce.
conv_answer: Now place about 1 tablespoon filling on each egg roll wrapper.
target_answer: 9) Place about 1 tablespoon filling on each egg roll wrapper.

predictions: 2) In a large bowl, mix the cabbage, carrot, green bell pepper, onion, garlic and ginger.
labels: 10) Fold one corner of wrapper over filling.

Question: What is your first instruction for me to make English muffins? 
 Context: Ingredients: 3 hard-cooked eggs, chopped, 1/4 cup crushed saltine crackers, 1/4 cup chopped celery, 1 tablespoon diced pimientos, 1/2 cup mayonnaise, 2 tablespoons milk, 1/8 teaspoon salt, 1/8 teaspoon garlic salt, 1/8 teaspoon pepper, 2 English muffins, split and toasted, 
Directions: 0) In a bowl, combine the eggs, crackers, celery and pimientos. 1) In another bowl, combine the mayonnaise, milk, salt, garlic salt and pepper; mix well. 2) Stir into the egg mixture. 3) Spoon about 1/3 cup onto each muffin half; place on an ungreased baking sheet. 4) Broil for 3-4 minutes or until lightly browned.
conv_answer: Take a bowl, combine the eggs, crackers, celery and pimientos.

Question: How should I start with salsa and cilantro? 
 Context: Ingredients: 2 1/2 teaspoons vegetable oil, 6 (6 inch) corn tortillas, cut into 1/2 inch strips, 3 cups chicken broth, 1/2 teaspoon ground cumin, 1/2 teaspoon chili powder, 1/2 teaspoon dried oregano, 1 (15 ounce) can black beans, rinsed and drained, 1 (15 ounce) can whole kernel corn, drained, 2 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves, cut into bite size pieces, 1/2 cup salsa, 1/2 cup chopped fresh cilantro, 
Directions: 0) Heat 2 teaspoons of the oil in a large pot over medium heat. 1) Add half of the tortilla strips, stirring often, until crisp. 2) Drain on paper towels. 3) Repeat with remaining 1/2 teaspoon of oil and remaining tortilla strips and set aside. 4) Add the broth, cumin, chili powder and oregano to the pot. 5) Raise heat to high and bring to a boil. 6) Add the beans, corn, chicken and salsa. 7) Reduce heat to low, stir and simmer for about 2 minutes, or until chicken is cooked through and no longer pink inside. 8) Add the cilantro and half of the reserved tortilla strips. 9) Ladle into individual bowls and garnish each bowl with some of the remaining strips.
conv_answer: Great. First take a large pot and heat 2 teaspoons of the oil over medium heat.
target_answer: 0) Heat 2 teaspoons of the oil in a large pot over medium heat.

Directions: 0) Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). 1) Place bacon in a skillet and cook over medium heat until the pieces are browned. 2) Remove with a slotted spoon to paper towels. 3) Discard all but 1 tablespoon of bacon grease. 4) Stir in onions and mushrooms, and cook until soft. 5) Remove from heat. 6) In a large bowl, stir together beef, egg, and milk. 7) Stir in the onion and mushrooms. 8) Mix in about 4 ounces of Swiss cheese, and all but 1 tablespoon of bacon. 9) Stir in cornflake crumbs, and mix until well blended. 10) Shape into a loaf, and place in a meatloaf pan. 11) Bake in a preheated oven for 1 hour. 12) Drain fat, and sprinkle with remaining cheese and bacon. 13) Return to oven, and bake until cheese is melted, about 5 minutes.
conv_answer: Add beef, egg and milk to the bowl.

Question: How do I make Asian ginger dressing? 
 Context: Ingredients: 3 cloves garlic, minced, 2 tablespoons minced fresh ginger root, 3/4 cup olive oil, 1/3 cup rice vinegar, 1/2 cup soy sauce, 3 tablespoons honey, 1/4 cup water, 
Directions: 0) In a 1 pint glass jar or larger, combine the garlic, ginger, olive oil, rice vinegar, soy sauce, honey, and water. 1) Cover the jar with a tight fitting lid, and shake well. 2) Remove lid, and heat jar in the microwave for 1 minute just to dissolve the honey. 3) Let cool, and shake well before serving. 4) Store covered in the refrigerator.

Question: Okay good they are ready what's next? 
 Context: Ingredients: 1 (8 pound) bone-in shank ham, 4 cups water, or as needed, 1/2 cup honey, 1/2 cup brown sugar, 2 tablespoons liquid smoke flavoring, 2 tablespoons Worcestershire sauce, 1 pinch ground cloves, 
Directions: 0) Preheat the oven to 275 degrees F (135 degrees C). 1) Place ham in a roasting pan. 2) Pour in water to a 2 inch depth. 3) Cover with a tight fitting lid. 4) Bake for 6 to 8 hours in the preheated oven (all day or all night). 5) Remove from the oven, pour off drippings and reserve. 6) Debone ham, removing any excess fat as well, and return to the roasting pan. 7) Skim fat from the top of the drippings, and discard. 8) In a small bowl, mix one cup of the drippings with honey, brown sugar, liquid smoke, Worcestershire sauce and cloves. 9) Pour this over the ham, cover and return to the oven. 10) Remaining drippings may be discarded or reserved for other uses. 11) Bake for another 30 to 40 minutes in the preheated oven. 12) Let stand for 10 minutes before serving.
conv_answer: Now first preheat the oven to 135 degrees Celsius.
target_answer: 0) Preheat the oven to 275 degrees F (135 degrees C).

input:
Question: Can we start with the recipe for the 4 egg whites? 
 Context: Ingredients: 4 egg whites, 1 1/4 cups white sugar, 1 teaspoon vanilla extract, 1 teaspoon lemon juice, 2 teaspoons cornstarch, 1 pint heavy cream, 6 kiwi, peeled and sliced, 
Directions: 0) Preheat oven to 300 degrees F (150 degrees C). 1) Line a baking sheet with parchment paper. 2) Draw a 9 inch circle on the parchment paper. 3) In a large bowl, beat egg whites until stiff but not dry. 4) Gradually add in the sugar, 1 tablespoon at a time, beating well after each addition. 5) Beat until thick and glossy. 6) Overbeaten egg whites lose volume and deflate when folded into other ingredients. 7) Be absolutely sure not a particle of grease or egg yolk gets into the whites. 8) Gently fold in vanilla extract, lemon juice and cornstarch. 9) Spoon mixture inside the circle drawn on the parchment paper. 10) Working from the center, spread mixture toward the outside edge, building edge slightly. 11) This should leave a slight depression in the center. 12) Bake for 1 hour. 13) Cool on a wire rack. 14) Remove the paper, and place meringue on a flat serving plate. 15) Fill the center of the meringue with whipped cream, sweetened if desired. 16) Top whipped cream with kiwifruit slices.
conv_answer: Yes good! Now preheat the oven to 150 degrees Celsius.
target_answer: 0) Preheat oven to 300 degrees F (150 degrees C).

Directions: 0) Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). 1) Place carrots and onions in a pot with enough lightly salted water to cover, and bring to a boil. 2) Cook 5 minutes, or until tender but firm. 3) Drain, and spread 1/2 the carrots and onions in a baking dish. 4) Cover with 3/4 cup cheese, layer with remaining carrots and onions, and top with remaining cheese. 5) In a saucepan, melt 3 tablespoons butter and mix in flour until smooth. 6) Gradually stir in milk until thickened, and season with salt and pepper. 7) Pour over the carrots, onions, and cheese in the baking dish. 8) Melt 1 tablespoon butter in a small pot, and mix in bread crumbs. 9) Sprinkle evenly in the baking dish. 10) Bake 20 minutes in the preheated oven, or until bubbly and lightly browned.

Directions: 0) Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). 1) Place carrots and onions in a pot with enough lightly salted water to cover, and bring to a boil. 2) Cook 5 minutes, or until tender but firm. 3) Drain, and spread 1/2 the carrots and onions in a baking dish. 4) Cover with 3/4 cup cheese, layer with remaining carrots and onions, and top with remaining cheese. 5) In a saucepan, melt 3 tablespoons butter and mix in flour until smooth. 6) Gradually stir in milk until thickened, and season with salt and pepper. 7) Pour over the carrots, onions, and cheese in the baking dish. 8) Melt 1 tablespoon butter in a small pot, and mix in bread crumbs. 9) Sprinkle evenly in the baking dish. 10) Bake 20 minutes in the preheated oven, or until bubbly and lightly browned.
conv_answer: Now gradually stir in milk until it becomes thick and then season it with salt and pepper.

Question: Can we start with the recipe now? 
 Context: Ingredients: 2 quarts water, 12 ounces beef shank, 2 large onions, chopped, 2 large carrots, sliced, 1 rutabaga, diced, salt and pepper to taste, 4 potatoes, peeled and quartered, 2 leeks, sliced, 1 small head cabbage, sliced, 2 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley, 
Directions: 0) Bring water to boil in a large pot. 1) Place beef shank in, and simmer 1 1/2 hours. 2) Let cool overnight. 3) Lift meat out, trim off gristle and cut meat into medium sized pieces; set aside. 4) Skim fat from surface of stock, or strain through a fine sieve. 5) Return stock to heat, and bring to a boil. 6) Add onions, carrots and rutabaga. 7) Season with salt and pepper. 8) Simmer for 1 hour. 9) Add potatoes, and simmer until tender, 15 to 20 minutes. 10) Stir in the leeks, cabbage, parsley and reserved meat. 11) Simmer 10 minutes, or until cabbage is tender.

 Context: Ingredients: 2 quarts water, 12 ounces beef shank, 2 large onions, chopped, 2 large carrots, sliced, 1 rutabaga, diced, salt and pepper to taste, 4 potatoes, peeled and quartered, 2 leeks, sliced, 1 small head cabbage, sliced, 2 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley, 
Directions: 0) Bring water to boil in a large pot. 1) Place beef shank in, and simmer 1 1/2 hours. 2) Let cool overnight. 3) Lift meat out, trim off gristle and cut meat into medium sized pieces; set aside. 4) Skim fat from surface of stock, or strain through a fine sieve. 5) Return stock to heat, and bring to a boil. 6) Add onions, carrots and rutabaga. 7) Season with salt and pepper. 8) Simmer for 1 hour. 9) Add potatoes, and simmer until tender, 15 to 20 minutes. 10) Stir in the leeks, cabbage, parsley and reserved meat. 11) Simmer 10 minutes, or until cabbage is tender.
conv_answer: You shoud stir it in the mixture. You now can simmer for 10 minutes, or until cabbage is tender.

Question: What is the first step to completing the form? 
 Context: Ingredients: 6 eggs, beaten, 2 1/4 cups milk, 1/3 cup white sugar, 1 teaspoon vanilla extract, 1 cup heavy whipping cream, 2 teaspoons white sugar, 1 pinch ground nutmeg, 
Directions: 0) In a large saucepan, combine the eggs, milk and 1/3 cup sugar. 1) Cook and stir over medium heat until mixture coats a metal spoon. 2) Remove from heat. 3) Cool quickly by placing pan in a sink or bowl of ice water and stirring 1 to 2 minutes. 4) Stir in the vanilla. 5) Chill 4 to 24 hours. 6) Before serving, whip the cream and 2 tablespoons sugar until soft peaks form. 7) Transfer chilled egg mixture to a punch bowl. 8) Sprinkle each serving with nutmeg. 9) Fold in whipped cream mixture and serve at once.
conv_answer: You may start by taking a large saucepan and already add 6 beaten eggs.

 Context: Ingredients: 2 1/2 tablespoons olive oil, 3 tablespoons plain yogurt, 2 tablespoons distilled white vinegar, 1 medium onion, sliced, 2 cloves garlic, crushed, 1 tablespoon ginger paste, 2 small green chile peppers, 2 medium tomatoes, chopped, 2 tablespoons garam masala, 1 tablespoon dried mint, salt and pepper to taste, 5 sprigs cilantro, 1 (3 pound) whole chicken, skin removed and cut into pieces, 2 quarts water, 4 cups uncooked basmati rice, 1 bay leaf, 4 pods green cardamom, 1 pod black cardamom, 1 cinnamon stick, salt to taste, 1/4 teaspoon powdered yellow food coloring, 
Directions: 0) Heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. 1) Mix in the yogurt and vinegar. 2) Place the onion in the skillet, and cook until tender. 3) Mix in the garlic, ginger paste, green chile peppers, and tomatoes. 4) Cook and stir until tomatoes are tender. 5) Season with garam masala, mint, salt, and pepper, and mix in the cilantro. 6) Place the chicken in the skillet. 7) Reduce heat to medium-low, cover, and continue cooking 45 minutes, stirring occasionally, until chicken juices run clear. 8) Bring the water and rice to a boil in a large pot. 9) Mix in the bay leaf, green cardamom, black cardamom, and cinnamon. 10) Season with salt to taste. 11) Cover, reduce heat to low, and simmer 20 minutes. 12) In a separate pot, alternate the rice and chicken mixture in layers, topping with rice. 13) Sprinkle with the food coloring, and mix to serve.

Question: What is the first step to getting ready? 
 Context: Ingredients: 1 1/3 cups yellow mustard, 2 (1 ounce) envelopes dry onion soup mix, 1 (5 pound) beef rump roast, 
Directions: 0) In a small bowl, mix together the mustard and onion soup mix. 1) Lay out two long sheets of aluminum foil crosswise. 2) Pat the roast dry, and place in the center of the foil. 3) Generously coat the roast with the mustard mixture. 4) Wrap the foil tightly around the roast, then apply one more piece of foil to really seal it in so that the roast can be rotated without all of the juices spilling out. 5) Prepare an outdoor grill for indirect heat. 6) For charcoal, light the coals, then move to one side of the grill. 7) Place the roast on the grill, and cover. 8) Cook for about 2 hours, turning every 30 to 45 minutes, or until the internal temperature is at least 145 degrees F (63 degrees C). 9) Let stand for about 10 minutes before carving. 10) Place on a deep serving plate before unwrapping so you can be sure to save the juices and mustard rub to slather on the beef slices.
conv_answer: Take a small bowl.

 Context: Ingredients: 1 1/3 cups yellow mustard, 2 (1 ounce) envelopes dry onion soup mix, 1 (5 pound) beef rump roast, 
Directions: 0) In a small bowl, mix together the mustard and onion soup mix. 1) Lay out two long sheets of aluminum foil crosswise. 2) Pat the roast dry, and place in the center of the foil. 3) Generously coat the roast with the mustard mixture. 4) Wrap the foil tightly around the roast, then apply one more piece of foil to really seal it in so that the roast can be rotated without all of the juices spilling out. 5) Prepare an outdoor grill for indirect heat. 6) For charcoal, light the coals, then move to one side of the grill. 7) Place the roast on the grill, and cover. 8) Cook for about 2 hours, turning every 30 to 45 minutes, or until the internal temperature is at least 145 degrees F (63 degrees C). 9) Let stand for about 10 minutes before carving. 10) Place on a deep serving plate before unwrapping so you can be sure to save the juices and mustard rub to slather on the beef slices.
conv_answer: Now add 1/3 cups of yellow mustard and 1 ounce of dry onion soup mix to the bowl.
target_answer: 0) In a small bowl, mix together the mustard and onion soup mix.

predictions: 0) In a small bowl, mix together the mustard and onion soup mix.
labels: 1) Lay out two long sheets of aluminum foil crosswise.

Question: How should I start the condensed beef and mushroom soup recipe? 
 Context: Ingredients: 3 pounds ground beef, 17 saltine crackers, finely crushed, 1/2 cup milk, 1 1/2 teaspoons garlic powder, 1 1/2 teaspoons onion powder, 1/4 teaspoon ground black pepper, 1 pinch salt, or to taste, 1/2 cup all-purpose flour, 1 tablespoon vegetable oil, 1 1/2 cups water, 1 (10.75 ounce) can  condensed beef and mushroom soup, 1 (.75 ounce) packet dry brown gravy mix, 
Directions: 0) In a large bowl, mix together the ground beef, saltine crackers and milk. 1) Season with garlic powder, onion powder, salt and pepper, and mix until well blended. 2) Line a 10x15 inch jellyroll pan with waxed paper. 3) Press the beef mixture firmly into the pan. 4) Cover with plastic wrap, and refrigerate 8 to 10 hours, or overnight. 5) Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). 6) Remove plastic wrap from meat, and rub flour over the top side of the beef. 7) Flip out of the pan onto waxed paper, and rub flour on the other side as well. 8) Cut into pieces (I use a pizza cutter). 9) Heat oil in a large heavy skillet over medium-high heat. 10) Fry the meat until browned on each side, turning only once. 11) Remove to a 9x13 inch baking dish. 12) In a medium bowl, mix together the water, condensed soup, and gravy mix. 13) Pour over the meat in the dish. 14) Cover the dish loosely with aluminum foil. 15) Bake for 1 hour in the preheated oven. 16) Serve fake steak and gravy with potatoes, rice, or noodles.
conv_answer: You should take a large bowl and mix together the ground beef, saltine crackers and milk.
target_answer: 0) In a large bowl, mix together the ground beef, saltine crackers and milk.

predictions: 0) In a large bowl, mix together the ground beef, saltine crackers and milk.
labels: 1) Season with garlic powder, onion powder, salt and pepper, and mix until well blended.

Directions: 0) In a large bowl, mix together the ground beef, saltine crackers and milk. 1) Season with garlic powder, onion powder, salt and pepper, and mix until well blended. 2) Line a 10x15 inch jellyroll pan with waxed paper. 3) Press the beef mixture firmly into the pan. 4) Cover with plastic wrap, and refrigerate 8 to 10 hours, or overnight. 5) Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). 6) Remove plastic wrap from meat, and rub flour over the top side of the beef. 7) Flip out of the pan onto waxed paper, and rub flour on the other side as well. 8) Cut into pieces (I use a pizza cutter). 9) Heat oil in a large heavy skillet over medium-high heat. 10) Fry the meat until browned on each side, turning only once. 11) Remove to a 9x13 inch baking dish. 12) In a medium bowl, mix together the water, condensed soup, and gravy mix. 13) Pour over the meat in the dish. 14) Cover the dish loosely with aluminum foil. 15) Bake for 1 hour in the preheated oven. 16) Serve fake steak and gravy with potatoes, rice, or noodles.

Directions: 0) Place cubed beef and flour in a resealable plastic bag. 1) Seal and shake to evenly coat beef with flour. 2) Heat the oil in a skillet over medium heat, and brown beef on all sides. 3) Transfer to a slow cooker. 4) Melt the butter in the skillet over medium heat, and cook onion until tender. 5) Transfer to the slow cooker with the beef. 6) Pour wine into the skillet to deglaze, then pour wine into slow cooker. 7) Dissolve the beef bouillon cube in 1 cup hot water, and pour into slow cooker. 8) Place potato and carrots in slow cooker, and season with rosemary, thyme, garlic powder, and pepper. 9) Mix in remaining water and Worcestershire sauce. 10) Add more water if needed to cover all ingredients. 11) Cover slow cooker, and cook stew 7 to 8 hours on low heat.
conv_answer: Ok that is tremendous. Now first place the cubed beef and flour in a resealable plastic bag. Seal it and shake the bag to evenly coat beef with flour.

Question: Ok good I still had some Grand Marnier at home. 
 Context: Ingredients: 4 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves, 1 cup milk, 1 cup dry bread crumbs, 1 cup grated Parmesan cheese, 2 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley, 1 cup olive oil, 1 orange, sliced into rounds, 1 cup dry white wine, 1/2 cup orange juice, 1 (10.5 ounce) can chicken broth, 1/4 cup brandy-based orange liqueur (Grand Marnier), 
Directions: 0) Slice chicken breasts in thirds horizontally to make 12 thin chicken fillets. 1) Lightly pound each piece. 2) Place in a dish, and pour milk over them. 3) Soak for 10 minutes. 4) In a shallow bowl, stir together the bread crumbs, Parmesan cheese and parsley. 5) Set aside. 6) Heat olive oil in a large heavy skillet over medium-high heat. 7) Dredge chicken pieces in the bread crumb mixture, and place in the hot oil. 8) Quickly brown on both sides, then remove to a buttered 9x13 inch baking dish, or similar size. 9) Season with salt and pepper to taste. 10) Place orange slices over the top of the chicken. 11) Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). 12) Drain the oil from the skillet, reserving 1/4 cup. 13) Heat the reserved oil with the wine over medium heat until reduced by 1/2. 14) Add broth and orange juice, and reduce by 1/2 again. 15) Pour the sauce over the chicken, then drizzle with Grand Marinier. 16) Bake for 20 to 25 minutes in the preheated oven, until bubbly.
conv_answer: Great, I knew you were a grand marnier lover". Now slice thechicken breasts in thirds horizontally to make 12 thin chicken fillets.

 Context: Ingredients: 4 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves, 1 cup milk, 1 cup dry bread crumbs, 1 cup grated Parmesan cheese, 2 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley, 1 cup olive oil, 1 orange, sliced into rounds, 1 cup dry white wine, 1/2 cup orange juice, 1 (10.5 ounce) can chicken broth, 1/4 cup brandy-based orange liqueur (Grand Marnier), 
Directions: 0) Slice chicken breasts in thirds horizontally to make 12 thin chicken fillets. 1) Lightly pound each piece. 2) Place in a dish, and pour milk over them. 3) Soak for 10 minutes. 4) In a shallow bowl, stir together the bread crumbs, Parmesan cheese and parsley. 5) Set aside. 6) Heat olive oil in a large heavy skillet over medium-high heat. 7) Dredge chicken pieces in the bread crumb mixture, and place in the hot oil. 8) Quickly brown on both sides, then remove to a buttered 9x13 inch baking dish, or similar size. 9) Season with salt and pepper to taste. 10) Place orange slices over the top of the chicken. 11) Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). 12) Drain the oil from the skillet, reserving 1/4 cup. 13) Heat the reserved oil with the wine over medium heat until reduced by 1/2. 14) Add broth and orange juice, and reduce by 1/2 again. 15) Pour the sauce over the chicken, then drizzle with Grand Marinier. 16) Bake for 20 to 25 minutes in the preheated oven, until bubbly.
conv_answer: Great, now soak for 10 minutes. When 10 minutes passed take a shallow bowl, stir together the bread crumbs, Parmesan cheese and parsley.
target_answer: 3) Soak for 10 minutes.

predictions: 4) In a shallow bowl, stir together the bread crumbs, Parmesan cheese and parsley.
labels: 5) Set aside.

 Context: Ingredients: 1 small onion, finely chopped, 1 medium tomato, diced, 1 stalk celery, chopped, 1 green bell pepper, finely chopped, 1 cup shredded Cheddar cheese, 1/4 teaspoon chili powder, 1/4 teaspoon salt, 4 slices white bread, 
Directions: 0) Preheat your oven's broiler. 1) In a medium bowl, stir together the onion, tomato, celery, bell pepper, cheese, chili powder and salt. 2) Arrange slices of bread on a baking sheet or broiling pan. 3) Top each one with 1/4 of the mixture, spreading out to the edges. 4) Broil for 4 to 5 minutes, or until cheese melts. 5) Watch closely to prevent burning. 6) Serve immediately.
